options.name: Communications Specialist
options.description: Gain +1 Technology and +1 Negotiation. You can operate and repair communication devices with expertise.

options.name: Signal Booster
options.description: You can amplify communication signals to double their normal range. Gain +1 Technology.

options.name: Universal Translator
options.description: Gain +1 Negotiation. You can understand and communicate in any language after hearing it for 1 minute, though with limited fluency.

options.name: Clear Channel
options.description: Gain +1 Technology. You can establish secure communications that cannot be intercepted or jammed by conventional means.

options.name: Action : Emergency Broadcast
options.description: Send a critical message that reaches all communication devices within 1 mile, overriding any blocks or interference.

options.name: Reaction : Signal Intercept
options.description: When you detect an electronic communication within range, you can intercept and decode it before it reaches its intended recipient.

options.name: Battlefield Coordination
options.description: Gain +1 Negotiation and +1 Technology. You can use communication systems to coordinate allies, giving up to 3 allies a +1 bonus to Attack rolls for 1 minute.

options.name: Action : Precise Targeting
options.description: Use communication systems to guide an ally's attack. One ally within communication range gains advantage on their next attack roll and deals an additional 1d6 damage if it hits.

options.name: Electronic Warfare
options.description: Gain +1 Technology. You can jam enemy communications or electronic devices within 100 feet for 1 minute with a successful Technology check.

options.name: Master Communications Specialist
options.description: Gain +1 Technology and +1 Negotiation. You can communicate with allies telepathically within 1 mile as long as they are carrying a communication device. You can also pinpoint the location of any active communication device within 1 mile.
